item.description:
The last two meetings were informative and we all enjoyed getting to know each other. How about you? Want to join a lively discussion group?

This month's speaker will be Lynn Kimmel, who owns des rosiers design. Here's the link:
http://desrosiers-des...

From her site: "Principal designer Lynn Kimmel takes the time to understand her clients' objectives, desires, aspirations and lifestyle before creating the perfect personal space. Her design strategies, project management and exceptional skill at building relationships help clients discover the hidden potential to make their dream rooms come to life."

Lynn will be talking about staging homes for sale. I know that you'll enjoy meeting her and listening to her speak. Any women particularly concerned with real estate will want to be there!

Light snacks will be served. Please bring your business cards for a raffle!

Check out the venue poll, too! Would you prefer Boston? North of Boston? South? West, but not Newton? Speak up!
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.why: You'll have the opportunity to meet career women like you who want to support each other. Every month, we'll have a different speaker who will present a topic of interest. Plus, there will be lots of time for socializing!
item.name: Women in Business Network April Meeting
